Control Name: INCIDENT HANDLING | AUTOMATED INCIDENT HANDLING PROCESSES
Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to support the incident handling process.Supplemental Guidance:  Automated mechanisms supporting incident handling processes include, for example, online incident management systems.
